name: SeaFood Special
subtitle: Fried Salmon Special
description: Indulge in our Fried Salmon Special, featuring succulent salmon fillets perfectly seasoned and crispy on the outside while tender and flaky inside. Served with a side of fresh garden vegetables and a tangy lemon butter sauce, this dish is a seafood lover's dream.

name: Sumptuous Desserts
subtitle: Choco Ice Cream Sandwich
description: Treat yourself to our Choco Ice Cream Sandwich, a decadent dessert that combines rich chocolate ice cream sandwiched between two freshly baked chocolate chip cookies. Topped with a drizzle of chocolate fudge and a sprinkle of crushed nuts for an extra crunch.

name: Buffet
subtitle: Mixed Buffet
description: Experience a culinary feast with our Mixed Buffet, offering a diverse selection of dishes to satisfy every palate. From savory appetizers and hearty main courses to a variety of salads and delectable desserts, our buffet ensures a delightful dining experience for all guests.
